280d0a7556f8cecc3fc8240a451d","dweb:/ipfs/QmbTFZkXfw8cmw4ycFxegAKq6fGdZahGPaWfRnQnNpdpuW"]},"src/libraries/MarketState.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb7793014b8a5c7a0e220cf53e89d68f4b8d0dd3490f4eb724a41af0aae3bfd16","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://92eb443308dc9430005d3d71a561551adf3ca6c8cbda9d3c07efb1da4d9875d3","dweb:/ipfs/QmNZBwipjFgtVRzYBaLj4D56MdkrfxTdPnTYBdkNAe8AWZ"]},"src/libraries/MathUtils.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb173a2e8a5307f4572913b106850da941d43ff08e34dce9c5d6d5b1796b3c70b","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://ad551e17519b8216a0ef8086242d03464b15ba589fcea5a6a57ba46cd8efec29","dweb:/ipfs/QmRqCvBSRm3cZaFFoUWit9TCg2tba6XZQv3m9yapuRoDhM"]},"src/libraries/SafeCastLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0xcf7875ea077b0669e0305479319ffad5bf5e15aadc4e6cb94bf7c95096259628","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://75afeaa1a64b9c87d0f4ef3079a007be8f1204eebc3b193214bba66dccf07673","dweb:/ipfs/QmV4ANSZVJSzxfMcPjtEewpqMWtDU68h6nWGzgwKreLscX"]},"src/types/HooksConfig.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3117febf323cbe263419057bc2d1ade6754afbbe5808beebc24936be477e5691","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8e5ff5c4a099f43ec5443ab78029e3dd386ad74e2bb449c47071ef046fde8fc1","dweb:/ipfs/QmPrVySdXnAUh1iPrtZL1auueaCTrLAqqWymbXg6iXkEBy"]}},"version":1}

addHooksTemplate(address,string,address,.details: Add a hooks template that stores the initcode for the template.      On success:      - Emits `HooksTemplateAdded` on success.      - Adds the template to the list of templates.      - Creates `HooksTemplate` struct with the given parameters mapped to the template address.      Reverts if:      - The caller is not the owner of the arch-controller.      - The template already exists.      - The fee settings are invalid.

deployHooksInstance(address,bytes).details: Deploy a hooks instance for an approved template with constructor args.      On success:      - Emits `HooksInstanceDeployed`.      - Deploys a new hooks instance with the given templates and constructor args.      - Maps the hooks instance to the template address.      Reverts if:      - The caller is not an approved borrower.      - The template does not exist.      - The template is not enabled.      - The deployment fails.

deployMarket((address,string,string,uint.details: Deploy a market with an existing hooks deployment (in `parameters.hooks`)      On success:      - Pays the origination fee (if applicable).      - Calls `onDeployMarket` on the hooks contract.      - Deploys a new market with the given parameters.      - Emits `MarketDeployed`.      Reverts if:      - The caller is not an approved borrower.      - The hooks instance does not exist.      - Payment of origination fee fails.      - The deployment fails.      - The call to `onDeployMarket` fails.      - `originationFeeAsset` does not match the hook template's      - `originationFeeAmount` does not match the hook template's

deployMarketAndHooks(address,bytes,(addr.details: Deploy a hooks instance for an approved template,then deploy a new market with that      instance as its hooks contract.      Will call `onCreateMarket` on `parameters.hooks`.

disableHooksTemplate(address).details: Disable a hooks template.      On success:      - Emits `HooksTemplateDisabled` on success.      - Disables the `HooksTemplate` struct mapped to the template address.      Reverts if:      - The caller is not the owner of the arch-controller.      - The template does not exist.

getHooksTemplateDetails(address).details: Get the name and fee configuration for an approved hooks template.

getHooksTemplateForInstance(address).details: Get the template that was used to deploy a hooks instance.

getHooksTemplates().details: Get the list of approved hooks templates.

getMarketParameters().details: Get the temporarily stored market parameters for a market that is      currently being deployed.

isHooksInstance(address).details: Check if a hooks instance was deployed by the factory.

isHooksTemplate(address).details: Check if a hooks template is approved.

registerWithArchController().details: Set-up function to register the factory as a controller with the arch-controller.      This enables the factory to register new markets.

updateHooksTemplateFees(address,address,.details: Update the fees for a hooks template.      On success:      - Emits `HooksTemplateFeesUpdated` on success.      - Updates the fees for the `HooksTemplate` struct mapped to the template address.      Reverts if:      - The caller is not the owner of the arch-controller.      - The template does not exist.      - The fee settings are invalid.
